review_en: A comprehensive shopping mall with unusual structure! There are shops of various brands on both sides of the open corridor, and there are also several restaurants. The basement is a big supermarket, Homeplus! If you have been to Hakata in Canal City, Fukuoka, you will feel similar. It is connected directly from Hapjeong Station, so traffic is convenient, and the main hall is decorated with various decorations depending on the time, making it a great attraction. Personally, he has been visiting the area since 2013 as a resident frequently since 2013.

review: 공간 구성이 특이한 복합 쇼핑몰 공간 구성이 특이한 복합 쇼핑몰. 실내이면서도 하늘이 뚫려있는 독특한 공간 탓에 겨울이나 비가 올 때는 비를 맞을 수도 있지만 그 덕분에 독특한 매력을 지닌 곳. 다양한 편집샵에서부터 특이한 소품집, 그리고 식당, 영화관까지. 주차도 편리하기에 합정동에서 한번에 해결하기에 좋은 곳. 더불어 주말에는 플리 마켓까지 열리기에 다양한 핸드 크래프트 제품들을 만나볼 수 있는 장소로 좋음.
review_en: Complex shopping mall with unique space composition. Complex shopping mall with unique spatial composition. Parking is convenient, so it's a good place to solve at once in Hapjeong-dong. Plus, it's a great place to see a variety of handcraft products on weekends.
